p:
For each country c, we calculate GDPcap
NoAnthro and ∆GDPcap for each of the 1,000 bootstrapped response functions f
b , applied to the counterfactual temperature timeseries T
NoAnthro from each of the 21 global climate models (thus yielding more than 20,000 values of GDPcap
NoAnthro and ∆GDPcap for each country).
